Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay, I need to create a Log Skeleton dictionary for the given order fulfillment process...

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process starts with RO. Then CA must come after RO...

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: RO must come first. Then CA must happen after RO. Then RI must come after CA...

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The always_before set would include (CA, RO), (RI, CA), (PI, RI), (QC, PI)...

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The directly_follows set would include all the immediate sequence pairs...

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Another check: the directly_follows must include all the immediate next steps...

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Another thing to check: the 'never_together' is empty, which is acceptable...

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Wait, the first pair in the sequence is RO followed by CA. So the equivalence between RO and CA must be included...

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Putting all this together, each activity occurs exactly once, and dependencies are enforced by constraints...
